channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Book Review: A Wealth of Well-Being
item.description: Finance practitioners can benefit from Meir Statman's challenge to make finance an “afterthought” and spend more time thinking about life well-being.

item.title: Nvidia hits $3 trillion, making CEO Jensen Huang richer than Michael Dell
item.description: Huang, 61, is leading a new wave of tech billionaires

item.title: What’s Your Client’s Optimal Equity Allocation?
item.description: Note to investment advisors: You may be overestimating the risks of equities for conservative investors with longer investment horizons.

item.title: Nicotine patches, like Zyn, are used by 400,000 teens. Here's why some experts say 'it's reasonable to be concerned'
item.description: Health risks of nicotine include a moderately elevated risk of increased blood pressure, heart rate, and a narrowing of the arteries.

item.title: Gold and Inflation: An Unstable Relationship
item.description: While there are periods when gold has hedged inflation quite well, beware blanket claims of gold's inflation-hedging utility.

item.title: Tides turn for seafood—more fish were farm-raised than caught in the wild for the first time ever
item.description: Some 90% of aquatic animals that are farmed or fished go to human consumption, per the UN.

item.title: Monetary Policy and Financial Conditions: Meaningful Relationship?
item.description: An analysis of the Fed's recent rounds of quantitative tightening (QT) and quantitative easing (QE) yields actionable insights about the relationship between monetary policy and financial conditions.

item.title: Kia recalls 463,000 Telluride SUVs that could catch fire and cautions drivers to park outdoors
item.description: People may notice a burning or melting smell, or see smoke rising from underneath the seat.

item.title: Five Quotes from Financial History to Guide Trustees
item.description: If you serve as a trustee of an institutional investment plan, these five quotes may help guide your decisions for the benefit of those who depend on your stewardship.

item.title: Cold Stone Creamery is facing a legal battle after a New York woman discovered that her 'pistachio' ice cream contained no real pistachios
item.description: Rather than the nuts, the dessert contained a mix of water, ethanol, and food coloring.
